text: Proholoshuyutʹ: "Tse yavlyaye soboyu pravdu z vashoho Lorda," todi whoever wills dozvolyayutʹ yomu vvazhayutʹ, ta whoever wills dozvolyayutʹ yomu disbelieve. My mayemo hotovi do porushnykiv vohonʹ shcho povnistyu otochytʹ yikh. Koly vony krychatʹ dlya dopomohy, vony budutʹ davatysya ridkyy lyublyatʹ skontsentrovani kyslotnyy shcho scalds oblychchya. Shcho neshchasnyy napiy! Shcho neshchasna dolya
